name: Amber Lewis Avant-Grade Keane Slipcover Sofa
descriptionShort: Designed by Amber Lewis in collaboration with Anthropologie, this slipcover sofa features a modern, squared silhouette that lends a tailored edge to your living space, while loose, feather-filled cushions provide the look of ease and relaxation. Upholstered in an avant garde stripe, this polished piece is lounge-worthy addition to any room of your abode.
descriptionDetails: Two seat and one back cushion; feather blend fill
Microfilament webbed seat and back suspension
CAD-engineered hardwood frame; maple wood legs
This piece is intended for indoor use
